derivation: middle voice of a (presumed) strengthened form of G71 (ἡγέομαι);
kjv_def: account, (be) chief, count, esteem, governor, judge, have the rule over, suppose, think
strongs_def: to lead, i.e. command (with official authority); figuratively, to deem, i.e. consider
outline:
1. to lead
    1. to go before
    2. to be a leader
      1. to rule, command
      2. to have authority over
      3. a prince, of regal power, governor, viceroy, chief, leading as respects influence, controlling in counsel, overseers or leaders of the churches
      4. used of any kind of leader, chief, commander
      5. the leader in speech, chief, spokesman
    3. to consider, deem, account, think
